# FrameWorks

> Sovereign SaaS for live video. MCP-native with wallet auth and x402 payments.

## Docs

- [MCP Integration](https://docs.frameworks.network/streamers/mcp): Resources, tools, prompts, x402 payments
- [Skill File](https://frameworks.network/SKILL.md): Agent quick-start guide
- [Agent Overview](https://docs.frameworks.network/agents/overview): Discovery, auth, and capabilities
- [Skipper Video Consultant](https://docs.frameworks.network/agents/skipper): RAG-grounded streaming expertise

## API

- MCP Discovery: https://api.frameworks.network/.well-known/mcp.json
- MCP Endpoint: POST https://api.frameworks.network/mcp (streamable-http)
- GraphQL: POST https://api.frameworks.network/graphql
- Wallet Login: POST https://api.frameworks.network/auth/wallet-login

## Auth

- Bearer token (JWT or API key)
- Wallet signature (EIP-191 personal_sign)
- x402 (gasless USDC on Base/Arbitrum)

## Optional

- [Full skill.json](https://frameworks.network/skill.json): Machine-readable metadata
- [Agent Access Architecture](https://github.com/livepeer-frameworks/monorepo/blob/development/docs/architecture/agent-access.md)
